.. _`design_system_components_table`:

Table
=====

.. figure:: images/component_table.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Renders data in rows and columns. Provides plugins for grouping, sorting, and filtering entries.
Supplies functions for display control and calling operations on objects.
The basic table component is used in several table-based components that offer functionality for
special use cases (refer to the Related Components).

API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-table.index.__module__`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_relationshiptable`

:ref:`design_system_components_tablecatalog`
